## Magic Garbage Truck [MGT]
### Updated for 1.3.6* and Bridges DLC
Handle garbage your way: - **Total Magic** option removes the need for any garbage buildings or trucks. - **Semi-Magic** option increases garbage truck capacity to improve service and reduce traffic.
---
### How it works
**OPTION 1 - TOTAL MAGIC** - ✅ Magic Garbage on, removes all garbage instantly. - Perfect if you want to forget about all garbage buildings. - Set it and forget it! (most like classic old "magical garbage") - No garbage issues; trucks and facilities are cosmetic now.
**OPTION 2 - SEMI-MAGIC (SUPER TRUCKS)** - Magic Garbage = OFF - Use the slider to increase garbage truck capacity [100>>500%]. - 🚚 Super powered trucks reduce traffic and service strain. - Great if you still want to see trucks driving around, just fewer problems. - Bonus: unload speed scales with capacity change. Facilities won't clog with mega truck unloads taking longer.
Do Option 1 or 2, not both (nothing bad will happen, it just won't do anything extra).
**OPTION 3 - NO MAGIC (Vanilla)** - For cities where you want vanilla gameplay, you don't need to uninstall. - Just uncheck the magic box[ ], set slider = 100%. Enjoy a normal game.
### Supports 6 languages * English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian * 简体中文 Simplified Chinese
---
### Compatibility - Safe to remove at any time; works with new and existing cities. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection; lightweight, compatible, and less likely to break with game updates.
